info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-general-cfg

p-img-dwnld.description: Download AP image in parallel on Image Master APs from external image server

aaa-high-threshold.description: High Threshold Value for AAA Outstanding request queue

ipc-high-threshold.description: High Threshold Value for IPC resources

ipc-low-threshold.description: Low Threshold Value for IPC resources

cpu-high-threshold.description: High Threshold Value for cpu resource

mobility-discovery-threshold-high.description: High Threshold Value for for allowed clients in mobility discovery

dtls-version.description: DTLS version used for AP join

token.description: This leaf is obsolete. Use clear-token leaf to set the Cisco DNA token

protocol.description: Protocol to be used for tesseract server

server-ip.description: Server IP of the tesseract server

encrypted.description: Flag to enable or disable encryption

username.description: Username to be used for tesseract server

password.description: Password to be used for tesseract server

frequency.description: Frequency in seconds, at which events from AP are to be sent to WLC

token-type.description: This leaf is obsolete. Cisco DNA token type can be clear only

na-fwd.description: Enable forwarding of unknown Neighbour Advertisement packets to wireless network

disable-client-ipv6.description: Disable IPv6 traffic for incoming wireless clients

ns-fwd.description: Enable forwarding of unknown Neighbour Solicitation packets to wireless network

nat-enable.description: NAT IP Address is enabled or disabled

private-ip-discovery.description: Discovery Response from Private IP is enabled or disabled

public-ip-discovery.description: Discovery Response from Public IP is enabled or disabled

tp-name.description: Trustpoint name of WLC certificate chain used for MIC AP join
Trustpoint name of WLC certificate chain used for MIC AP join

multicast-over-multicast-ipv4-addr.description: IPv4 Multicast group address for CAPWAP used by APs

multicast-over-multicast-ipv6-addr.description: IPv6 Multicast group address for CAPWAP used by APs

is-mdns-enabled.description: Flag to enable or disable mdns

accounting-action.description: Select action to be taken when APs are missing during accounting

accounting-percent.description: Percent of APs that must join back during accounting

client-steering.description: Forcefully steer clients away from AP when it is going for an upgrade

iteration-expiry.description: Set the maximum time allowed per iteration for the APs to join back. After this expiry, specified accounting action will be taken

client-deauth.description: De-authenticate clients connected to the AP going for an upgrade before AP reloads

tx-power-reduction.description: Reduce radio transmission power of the AP when it is selected for upgrade

threshold-warning.description: Enable or disable the threshold warning functionality
